title: My Little Brother
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR120L
description: My Little Brother is a sweet story with detailed illustrations that shares how a little girl responds to a baby brother entering her life. Repetitive sentences support early emergent readers. While reading, students will have the opportunity to analyze characters and connect to prior knowledge to help understand and remember the story.
meta: brother, feed, help, hold, meet, rock
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Analyze Character : Analyze characters to better understand the story
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
Pronouns : Recognize and use the pronoun I
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word my

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
